name: Aftermath
rules: Destruction Hero Required; Ongoing: When you play an ability, you may exhaust target hero or ally.
flavour: I'll deal with you in a moment.

name: Arcane Research
rules: You pay 1 less to play Arcane Research for each other card named Arcane Research in your graveyard.; Draw two cards.
flavour: Practice makes perfect.

name: Astral Grief
rules: Interrupt target quest reward effect.
flavour: I hate that you did all that work for nothing.

name: Bait the Trap
rules: Ongoing: Trap cards in your hand also have You may exhaust a defending ally in your party rather than pay this card's cost.
flavour: Come and get some!

name: Blast Wave
rules: Fire Hero Required; Your hero deals 2 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't protect this turn.
flavour: Time to turn up the heat!

name: Blessing of Salvation
rules: Ongoing: When Blessing of Salvation enters play, choose a friendly player.; That player is Untargetable.
flavour: Why is he laughing? - Blaine Roberts

name: Blessing of Sanctuary
rules: Protection Hero Required; Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: Prevent all combat damage that attached character would be dealt. When damage that an attacking ally would deal is prevented this way, destroy that ally.; At end of turn, destroy Blessing of Sanctuary.

name: Brace or Mace
rules: Choose one: Your hero heals 4 damage from target hero, or attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 ATK / +1 health.

name: Brain Lock
rules: Ongoing: Brain Lock enters play with two frost counters.; If an opponent would draw a card, he skips drawing that card and you remove a frost counter instead. If none remain, destroy Brain Lock.

name: Circle of Healing
rules: Holy Hero Required; Your hero heals 10 damage from each friendly hero and ally.
flavour: All your effort has been wasted.

name: Clinging Curse
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: Untargetable; At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character.
flavour: Hey, how do I get rid of this?

name: Crackling Purge
rules: Destroy target ability. If it wasn't attached to a friendly hero or ally, your hero may deal nature damage to its controller's hero equal to its cost.
flavour: To be honest, that wasn't quite what I had in mind. - Black Ice Fizzlefreeze

name: Crusader's Sweep
rules: Your hero deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: All are equal before the searing power of the Light.

name: Crush Soul
rules: Interrupt target ally card. If you do, remove it from the game and put damage on your hero equal to that card's ATK.
flavour: You didn't even have time to say hello.

name: Curse of Exhaustion
rules: Affliction Hero Required; Target player skips his next turn.
flavour: Submit now and ease your burden. - Little Shizzle

name: Demon Armor
rules: Ongoing: 1, Remove an ability card in your graveyard from the game -> Your hero heals 2 damage from itself.

name: Dirty Work
rules: Ongoing: If your hero would deal non-combat damage, it deals combat damage instead.
flavour: You never know what you'll get from a rogue. It's sort of their thing.

name: Disarm
rules: Destroy all of target player's weapons.
flavour: How about fisticuffs?

name: Disassemble
rules: Destroy target exhausted equipment.
flavour: Well, at least you got to use it once. - Koth

name: Disco Inferno!
rules: Ongoing: At the end of your turn, ready all exhausted heroes and allies in your party, then exhaust all other heroes and allies in your party.
flavour: As you as good on the battlefield as you are on the dance floor?

name: Divine Plea
rules: If you control an Aura, your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally.; If you control a Blessing, draw two cards.; If you control a Seal, ready your hero and all of your weapons.

name: Divine Spirit
rules: Discipline Hero Required; Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Draw a card, or ready up to three of your resources.
flavour: When the Light offers gifts, they are all wonderful.

name: Duty Bound
rules: Ongoing: Your hero is a Protector.; When your hero protects, ready it.
flavour: Warriors fight best when they have someone to fight for.

name: Energize
rules: Target player draws two cards.
flavour: A taste of the refreshing energies of the Emerald Dream.

name: Enslave Demon
rules: Attach to target Demon ally.; Ongoing: You control attached ally.
flavour: Trust me, he's better off this way. - Radak Doombringer

name: Equal Opportunity
rules: Each player puts an ally from his party into its owner's hand.
flavour: Let us reflect on this difference of opinion.

name: Exemplar's Blades
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally has +X ATK, where X is the highest ATK among your Melee weapons.
flavour: Watch and learn, friend.

name: Exemplar's Shield
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally has +X health, where X is the highest DEF among your armor.
flavour: Pay attention, friend.

name: Faces from the Past
rules: Put any number of target ally cards from your graveyard into play if their combined cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.

name: Far Sight
rules: Look at the top five cards of your deck. Choose one, shuffle the rest into your deck, then put that card on top.
flavour: My eyes are open.

name: Feint
rules: Remove target attacker from combat.
flavour: Sucker.

name: Feral Energy
rules: Ongoing: While in cat form, when your hero deals combat damage to a defending hero, you may pay 1 . If you do, its controller discards a card.

name: Ferociousness
rules: Ongoing: When your hero protects, draw a card.; Your hero is in bear form. (Is a Protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)
flavour: You'll never see an angry bear twice.

name: Fight or Blight
rules: Choose one: Target hero has Stealth this turn; or attach to target hero or ally that your hero dealt combat damage to this turn.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached character.

name: Finishing Shout
rules: Ongoing: Allies in your party have +1 ATK / +1 health.; Opposing allies have -1 ATK / -1 health.
flavour: The end is night!

name: Flickers from the Past
rules: Put any number of target ongoing ability cards from your graveyard into play if their combined cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.

name: Full Circle
rules: You may discard an ally card. If you do, put a second target ally card from your graveyard into play, then put a third target ally from your party into its owner's hand.

name: Furor
rules: Restoration Hero Required; Ongoing: When you play a Form, you may ready up to X of your resources, where X is its cost.
flavour: Whoa - I thought all you did was heal! - Victoria Jaton

name: Gifts from the Past
rules: Put any number of target equipment cards from your graveyard into play if their combined cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.

name: Holy Shock
rules: Holy Hero Required; Prevent the next 4 damage that target friendly hero or ally would be dealt this turn.; Your hero deals 4 unpreventable holy damage to target opposing hero or ally.

name: Ice Trap
rules: Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.); Your hero deals 3 frost damage to target attacker. Remove a character dealt damage this way from combat.

name: Infuriate
rules: Ongoing: When your hero is dealt combat damage, ready up to that many of your resources.
flavour: Pain fuels the rage of the murderous soul.

name: Insect Swarm
rules: Balance Hero Required; Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 2 nature damage to it.; Ongoing: Attached character has -2 ATK.
flavour: Annoying at first, deadly at last.

name: Knock Out
rules: Destroy target quest.
flavour: A quick blow to the head, and it's lights out.

name: Lesser Heal
rules: Your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: A priest can always find the Light.

name: Levitate
rules: Ongoing: At the start of each opponent's turn, that opponent chooses an ally in his party. That ally can't attack this turn.
flavour: Ye come back down here and fight like a dwarf! - Warrax

name: Lightning Arc
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.
flavour: Stand together and face me! - Zaritha

name: Mage Armor
rules: Ongoing: 1, Remove an ability card in your graveyard from the game -> Prevent the next 2 damage that your hero would be dealt this turn.

name: Magma Totem
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, Magma Totem deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.; (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

name: Mana Burst
rules: Ready all of target opponent's exhausted resources. Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to his hero for each resource readied this way.

name: Massacre
rules: As an additional cost to play, remove up to five Combo cards in your graveyard from the game.; Destroy X target exhausted allies, where X is the number of cards removed this way.
flavour: First they tire, then they expire.

name: Mend or End
rules: Choose one: Your hero heals 5 damage from target ally; or attach to one of your Melee weapons.; Ongoing: Attached weapon has +2 ATK.

name: Mindflip
rules: You may choose an ally in your party and have target player gain control of it. If you do, gain control of target ally in his party.
flavour: At times, the line between friend and foe is hazy.

name: Overkill
rules: As an additional cost to play, remove up to five Finishing Move cards from your graveyard from the game.; Each opponent destroys that many of his equipment and discards that many cards, and your hero deals that much melee damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Patient Shot
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has [Exhaust] -> This hero deals 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: I am in no hurry. My prey will soon show itself.

name: Pummel
rules: You may exhaust one of your Melee weapons rather than pay Pummel's cost.; Interrupt target ability card.
flavour: The first, best solution to anything.

name: Rain or Pain
rules: Choose one: At the end of this turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to each opposing ally, or attach to target ally.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 3 shadow damage to attached ally.

name: Raise from the Ashes
rules: As an additional cost to play, destroy an ally in your party.; Search your deck for a card with the same name as that ally and put it into play.

name: Rebirth
rules: Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.
reprinted: Twilight of the Dragons,Hunt For Illidan (EA)
flavour: Birth is less painful the second time. - Eriun Moonglow

name: Righteousness Aura
rules: Ongoing: If a hero or ally in your party would deal damage, it deals that much +1 instead.

name: Rotten to the Spore
rules: Exhaust any number of target allies in target opponent's party.; Ongoing: Each of them can't ready during its controller's ready step.
flavour: You should not always trust the earth you tread upon. - Tahanu Brinkrunner

name: Sap
rules: Attach to target hero or ally and exhaust it.; Ongoing: Attached character can't ready during its controller's ready step.; When attached character is dealt damage, destroy Sap.
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Seal of Retribution
rules: Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with a weapon, you may destroy target ally that attacked this turn.; 1, Destroy Deal of Retribution -> Destroy target ally that attacked this turn.

name: Shadow Word: Agony
rules: Attach to target hero.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, attached hero's controller discards a card.
flavour: I… hate… priests!

name: Shadowstep
rules: Subtlety Hero Required; Ongoing: Ready opposing heroes and allies also count as being exhausted. (They are still ready.)
flavour: Death is only a step away.

name: Shield or Wield
rules: Choose one: Prevent the next 3 damage that target ally would be dealt this turn, or attach to target hero.; Ongoing: Attached hero has +1 ATK while attacking.

name: Slay or Stay
rules: Choose one: Destroy target damaged ally; or attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally is a Protector.

name: Smoke or Croak
rules: Choose one: Your hero deals 3 fire damage to target hero; or attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack or protect, loses and can't have powers, and is a Frog.

name: Spirit Weapons
rules: Enhancement Hero Required; Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Target hero or ally has -X ATK this turn, where X is the combined ATK of your Melee weapons.

name: Stable Master
rules: Ongoing: You can have an additional Pet.
flavour: What?! She has two?!?! - Crazy Igvand

name: Stormfire
rules: Your hero deals 3 arcane damage to target hero or ally.; Draw a card.
flavour: A single spark can give rise to a raging inferno.

name: Supernova
rules: As an additional cost to play, destroy all of your resources.; Your hero deals fire damage to target hero equal to the number of resources destroyed this way.
flavour: You'll feel it before you see it.

name: Sweeping Strikes
rules: Arms Hero Required; Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with a Melee weapon to an ally, it also deals that much melee damage to each other hero and ally in that ally's party.

name: Taste for Blood
rules: Draw a card for each damaged opposing hero and ally.
flavour: Lick your wounds, curs. I have you now!

name: Taunting Blows
rules: Your hero deals 1 melee damage to each opposing hero and ally. This turn, characters dealt damage this way must attack if able and can attack only your hero if able.
flavour: Leaving so soon?

name: The Beast Within
rules: Beast Mastery Hero Required; While you have a Pet this turn, prevent all damage that your hero would be dealt, and your hero has +3 ATK.
flavour: Don't push me, lad. Or me pet. - Grumpherys

name: The Footsteps of Illidan
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: Attached character is also a Demon.
flavour: It is a path you can follow, but it's a dead end.

name: The More, the Scarier
rules: Your hero deals X fire damage to each of X target allies.
flavour: One singe, two flash, three cringe, four ash. - Troll nursery rhyme

name: Totemic Mastery
rules: Restoration Hero Required; Ongoing: Your Totems have +3 health.
flavour: Strong tools make great craftsmen. - Ringleader Kuma

name: Trueshot Aura
rules: Marksmanship Hero Required; Ongoing: Ranged allies in your party have +2 ATK while attacking.; Your Ranged weapons have +2 ATK while your hero is attacking.; If your hero would deal ranged damage with an ability, it deals that much +2 instead.

name: Typhoon
rules: Ongoing: Typhoon enters play with two wind counters.; Opposing heroes and allies can't attack or protect.; At the start of your turn, remove a wind counter. If none remain, destroy Typhoon.

name: Vicious Circle
rules: You may put an ally card from your hand into play. If you do, destroy a second target ally in your party, then put a third target ally card from your graveyard into hand.

name: Vigor
rules: Assassination Hero Required; Put Vigor into your resource row face down and ready.
flavour: Rogues are always behind you or a step ahead.

name: Viper Sting
rules: Attach to target hero.; Ongoing: At the start of attached hero's controller's turn, he exhausts one of his resources, or two if you have a Ranged weapon.
flavour: Not all targets bleed blood.

name: Vitality
rules: Protection Hero Required; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put a might counter on Vitality.; For each might counter, your hero has +1 ATK while attacking and +1 health.

name: Wipe or Snipe
rules: Choose one: Your hero deals 1 ranged damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies; or attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally has Long-Range.

name: Woe or Grow
rules: Choose one: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally; or attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 health.

name: Acolyte Kemistra
rules: 1, Put 2 damage on Kemistra -> Draw a card.
flavour: You take the high road. I'll take the eady path to power.

name: Akama
rules: Loyal Hero Required; Protector, Stealth; Other allies in your party are Untargetable.; Traitor cards can't be played.
flavour: When the time is right, the Betrayer will become...the betrayed.

name: Alamira Grovetender
rules: Nature Resistance (Prevent all nature [Nature] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
flavour: Nature will not harm me. I am its defender.

name: Alecia Hall
rules: When Alecia enters play, she heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: It appears I have arrived with time to spare.

name: Ambassador Jerrikar
rules: Jerrikar has Ferocity if an opponent went first this game.
flavour: As hard to pin down at the negotiating table as he is on the battlefield, the Ambassador thrives on taking chances.

name: Anchorite Ceyla
rules: Aldor Reputation; When another ally in your party is destroyed, its owner may put it from his graveyard into hand at the start of the next turn.
flavour: The Light will soon triumph over its enemies.

name: Anchorite Kilandra
rules: Aldor Reputation; When Kilandra enters play, name a card in play you control.; Inspire: Card with that name (You may ready a card you control with that name during each other player's ready step.)

name: Arcanist Bartis
rules: Scryer Reputation; Sabotage: Player (This ally can attack opposing players.); When Bartis sabotages a player, that player discards a card or destroys an ally in his party.

name: Arcanist Renaan
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor card in your deck.); If you would draw a card, you may draw it from the bottom of your deck instead.

name: Arcanist Thelis
rules: Scryer Reputation; Sabotage: Deck; When Thelis sabotages a deck, switch that deck with yours.
flavour: Take this flare…and deliver it to Commander Hobb.

name: Azaloth
rules: When Azaloth enters play, choose an opponent.; That opponent puts five Warlock ally tokens with 0 Shadow ATK / 5 health into play.; Azaloth can't attack while any of those tokens are in play.
flavour: Find a way to let him loose on his captors. - Exarch Onaala

name: Battlemage Vyara
rules: Scryer Reputation; You may exhaust Vyara rather than pay the cost of an ability with cost 7 or less, or a weapon's strike cost of 7 or less.
flavour: The survival of the Scryers hinges on outrecruiting Kael'thas.

name: Bimble Blackout
rules: Whem Bimble is removed from the game from anywhere, draw a card.
flavour: I wonder when I'm gonna have to pay for all this power… - Bimble Blackout's last journal entry

name: Blood Guard Gulmok
rules: Protector; When another Horde ally enters your party, you may destroy target ally.
flavour: Do your duty to the Horde, and join the fray!

name: Blood Knight Kyria
rules: Protector; When you play an ability, Kyria heals 4 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Death to all who oppose the blood elves!

name: Brodien
rules: As Brodien enters play, choose whether he is Elusive or Untargetable.
flavour: I'm gonna need a bigger bag.

name: Brok Bloodcaller
rules: Ferocity; At the end of your turn, destroy Brok if he's undamaged.
flavour: The time between fights is the time to find a fight.

name: Chief Apothecary Hildagard
rules: When Hildagard deals combat damage to a hero, destroy that hero.
flavour: Have you felt the cold chill? Perhaps what you thought was a hand on your shoulder?

name: Collidus the Warp-Watcher
rules: When Collidus enters play, put each other ally into its owner's hand.
flavour: Ummm… what is that?

name: Dashel Stonefist
rules: Dashel can attack friendly heroes and allies (including other characters in your party).
flavour: Have you met me friends?

name: Dawn Ravensdale
rules: When Dawn enters play, you may turn target face-down hero face up.
flavour: Do not let doubt assail you. You are far stronger than you realize.

name: Deathgrip Jones
rules: Protector; Your weapons can't be targeted by opponents.
flavour: A sharp sword is worth its weight in gold.

name: Defender Nagalaas
rules: Protector; Nagalaas has +2 ATK during each opponent's turn.
flavour: Be patient. Let the fight come to you.

name: Doomwalker
rules: When an opposing ability, ally, or equipment becomes exhausted, destroy it.
flavour: Do not proceed. You will be eliminated.

name: Edward the Odd
rules: Cards in opposing hand lose and can't have instant.
flavour: WILL anyone give me a HAND?

name: Elaar
rules: 2, [Exhaust] -> Gain control of target ally.
flavour: The Light is the only truth.

name: Elder Huntsman Swiftshot
rules: Long-Range; When Swiftshot or another [Ranged] ally enters your party, it may deal 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Give me an unbreakable bow and a bottomless quiver, and I will die happy.

name: Ethereal Plunderer
rules: When Ethereal Plunderer leaves play, you may gain control of target equipment.
flavour: The Consortium always collects its debts.

name: Exarch Onaala
rules: Aldor Reputation; 5 -> Onaala deals 4 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.; 4 -> Onaala heals 14 damage from target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: You've proven yourself not just to the Aldor, but to all of Outland.

name: Eyeball Jones
rules: When Eyeball deals combat damage to a hero or ally, exhaust that character, and it can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
flavour: Keep your eyes on the prize!

name: First Responder Avaressa
rules: Protector; At the start of your turn, Avaressa heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Trust in Velen.

name: First Responder Margan
rules: Elusive; At the start of your turn, Margan heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Each day is a blessing.

name: Flame Bender Ta'jin
rules: When Ta'jin enters play, gain control of target ability. If it's attached, you may reattach it.
flavour: What joo think, man? Dis spell look good on me?

name: Forager Cloudbloom
rules: When Cloudbloom readies, draw a card.
flavour: The fallen grant us their wisdom from the future.

name: Forager Hoofbeat
rules: Protector; When Hoofbeat readies, draw a card.
flavour: This Hoofbeat is terrifying to hear.

name: Harnum Firebelly
rules: Frost Resistance (Prevent all frost [Frost] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
flavour: The only cold that bothers me is the freezing wind of Icecrown.

name: High Instructor Campbell
rules: When Campbell enters play, you may put target Talent card from your graveyard into hand.
flavour: This next technique was used by Uther himself during the siege of Lordaeron.

name: Historian Firana
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor card in your deck.);Stealth;Opponents play with their hands revealed.
flavour: No secret is safe from the Scryers.

name: Illia the Bitter
rules: Fire Resistance (Prevent all fire [Fire] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
flavour: Fire, fool?! I have faced the red dragons of the Second War!

name: Instructor Giralo
rules: Aldor Reputation;Inspire: Ally (You may ready one of your allies during each other player's ready step.); When Giralo inspires an ally, that ally is a Protector this turn.
flavour: Learn from the Light and encourage others.

name: Kaelos Sunscream
rules: 1, Destroy another ally in your party -> Destroy target ability.
flavour: Do not trust Kaelos. He will doom you. - Ravenna

name: Kam'pah
rules: Opponents can't place quests face up.
flavour: She has nothing better to do.

name: Kathia the Quick
rules: When Kathia becomes exhausted, she deals 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally.

name: Kindara Mindflayer
rules: Kindara has +2 ATK / +2 health while an opposing hero is face up.
flavour: Holding back will be the last mistake you ever make!

name: Kurdran Wildhammer
rules: Elusive; When Kurdran becomes exhausted, he may deal 4 nature damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: In Shadowmoon Valley, legends fly on the winds.

name: Liandra Rustshadow
rules: Elusive; [Exhaust] -> Destroy target armor or item.
flavour: The Betrayer was once one of us, but his current appearance is more reflective of his true nature.

name: Lord Cindervein
rules: At the end of your turn, you may put target ability into its owner's hand.
flavour: Kor, get yer worthless beard over here!

name: Lu'ka de Wall
rules: Protector; When Lu'ka is dealt damage, you may exhaust target hero or ally.
flavour: Oh? Joo and what army, mon?

name: Luumon
rules: Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow [Shadow] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
flavour: All darkness will be overwhelmed by the Light of the naaru.

name: Madison Alters
rules: Untargetable; Madison has +1 ATK / +1 health for each hero in play.
flavour: The fragile bonds of life are begging to be…adjusted.

name: Magistrix Valthin
rules: Scryer Reputation; When an ability enters play, you may have target player gain control of it. If it's attached, that player may reattach it.
flavour: Why do you throw away such treasures?

name: Maiev Shadowsong
rules: Loyal Hero Required; Elusive, Ferocity, Long-Range, Protector, Stealth, Untargetable
flavour: My long hunt is finally over. Today, justice will be done!

name: Master Marksman McGee
rules: [Ranged] allies in your party have Long-Range.
flavour: In all the worlds, lads, there are only ever a few dozen yards that matter.

name: Natasha Hutchins
rules: Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow [Shadow] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
flavour: I have seen the other side… and I have returned.

name: Offender Gora
rules: Ferocity; Gora has -2 ATK during each opponent's turn.
flavour: Patience is not a traditional value of the orcs.

name: Ol' Stonewall
rules: Protector; At the start of your turn, destroy Ol' Stonewall.
flavour: Today is a good day to die.

name: Overlord Or'barokh
rules: Ferocity; When Or'barokh enters play, you may destroy target damaged ally.
flavour: The Kor'kron guard would be honored to fight by your side anytime.

name: Raena the Unpredictable
rules: At the end of your turn, choose whether Raena is Elusive or a Protector until the end of your next turn.
flavour: Do you really want to see me?

name: Ra'waza Stonetusk
rules: Protector; At the start of your turn, Ra'waza heals all damage from himself.
flavour: Once I see joo, mon, joo might as well get on your knees.

name: Retainer Alashon
rules: Scryer Reputation; Sabotage: All keywords; When Alashon sabotages keywords, opposing cards everywhere lose and can't have keyword powers while he remains in your party.

name: Retainer Faryn
rules: Scryer Reputation; Sabotage: Resource; When Faryn sabotages a resource, gain control of it. (Move it to your resource row.)
flavour: If we can cut their supply lines, they will choke to death.

name: Retainer Kai
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor card in your deck.); When Kai or another Scryer ally enters your party, opposing heroes and allies can't protect this turn.
flavour: The Scryers cannot be stopped.

name: Retainer Marcus
rules: Scryer Reputation; When Marcus enters play, look at target player's hand and name a card in it.; That player can't play cards with that name.
flavour: I'd reconsider my options if I were you.

name: Ripley Spellfizzle
rules: Arcane Resistance (Prevent all arcane [Arcane] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
flavour: I got somethin' special on these blades for ya, mage!

name: Roger Mortis
rules: 1, Put 1 damage on another ally in your party -> Roger deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: I do apologize. Are you feeling a bit lightheaded?

name: Roon Plainswalker
rules: Nature Resistance (Prevent all nature [Nature] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
flavour: After Ahn'Qiraj, I can't even feel it.

name: Sarlia
rules: Untargetable; 1 -> Other allies in your party are Elusive this turn.
flavour: I love attention, honey - just not that kind.

name: Scrapper Ironbane
rules: At the end of your turn, you may destroy target equipment.
flavour: That's for my brother!

name: Shadow
rules: Elusive; (Can't be attacked.)
flavour: Joo don't want ta hear de cat's purr, mon. Joo won't never hear nothin' again. - Warmaster Bo'jo

name: Skronk Skullseeker
rules: Skronk has +3 ATK while attacking an exhausted hero or ally.
flavour: One man's skull is this orc's trophy.

name: Spirit of Stormrage
rules: Untargetable; [Exhaust] -> Search your deck for a card and put it into hand.
flavour: Even deep within the Emerald Dream, Malfurion's spirit sensed Illidan's fall… and grieved.

name: Talian Bladebender
rules: Opponent's can't strike with weapons.
flavour: Scabbard a little rusty?

name: The Painsaw
rules: When The Painsaw enters play, you may destroy target ready weapon.
flavour: This fight is over.

name: The Soul Conductor
rules: The Soul Conductor had +1 ATK / +1 health for each ally card in opposing removed from game zones.
flavour: There are always lost souls who need direction.

name: Thief Catcher Norun
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer card in your deck.); Protector; Norun can also protect against attackers with Stealth.
flavour: I'm not like most guards.

name: Tusk
rules: Ferocity; When Tusk deals combat damage to a hero or ally, other heroes and allies in your party have Long-Range while attacking that character this turn.
flavour: Once I see joo, mon, joo might as well get on your knees.

name: Varen the Reclaimer
rules: Scryer Reputation; Sabotage: Game; When Varen sabotages a game, the winner of this game also wins the next game.
flavour: Show the Legion that the Scryers are not to be trifled with.

name: Velnoth
rules: Velnoth can protect your hero.; 2 -> Velnoth heals all damage from himself.
flavour: I don't like this place.

name: Vindicator Aluumen
rules: Aldor Reputation;Inspire: All friendly Protectors
flavour: Glory to the naaru!

name: Vindicator Falaan
rules: Aldor Reputation;Inspire: All friendly heroes and allies with [Exhaust] powers
flavour: Let us shout our defiance in the face of the defilers!

name: Vindicator Javlo
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer card in your deck.); When an ally in your party is inspired, draw a card.
flavour: The naaru are not gods. They are here with us, now.

name: Vindicator Kentho
rules: Aldor Reputation;Destroy Kentho -> Interrupt target card or effect targeting a card in play you control.
flavour: I will give everthing for our cause.

name: Vindicator Lorin
rules: Aldor Reputation;Inspire: Armor and item
flavour: When law and justice are at odds, the Vindicators settle things.

name: Vindicator Vasha
rules: Aldor Reputation; Cards in play with reputation other than Aldor lose and can't have powers.
flavour: The Aldor way is the true way.

name: Water Elemental
rules: Frost Hero Required; [Exhaust] -> Water Elemental deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

name: Webster
rules: At the end of your turn, you may put a web counter on target ally.; Allies with a web counter can't attack.; When Webster leaves play, remove all web counters from opposing allies.

name: Wildwatcher Elandra
rules: When Elandra enters play, target player shuffles his graveyard into his deck.
flavour: What the Betrayer has done to this land is unforgivable.

name: Wimbly Tinkerton
rules: Protector; When Wimbly defends, draw a card.
flavour: I have planned for every eventuality!

name: Xela the Tormentor
rules: When Xela enters play, you may put a Pet card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.
flavour: It will not be I who fights you.

name: Xi'ri
rules: At the end of your turn, destroy all Demons.
flavour: (We've been expecting you.)

name: Ya'za the Vandal
rules: When Ya'za enters play, you may destroy target armor or item.
flavour: Gimme somethin' to break.

name: Zorus the Judicator
rules: Protector; Zorus can't be destroyed by fatal damage.
flavour: Let it be known that Zorus has a sense of humor.

name: Akama's Sash
rules: Loyal Hero Required; If your hero would deal damage with an ability, it deals that much unpreventable damage +1 instead.; When an ally is destroyed by fatal damage dealt with an ability you control, remove that ally from the game.

name: Ar'tor's Mainstay
rules: When your hero deals damage with an ability, you may ready one of your resources.
flavour: My son may no longer be able to aid you, but his power is still within your grasp. - Oronok Torn-heart

name: Ashtongue Blade
rules: Loyal Hero Required; (Can't put this in your deck if your hero is a Traitor.); Untargetable
flavour: When the time is right, we will strike against the Betrayer. - Akama

name: Band of the Inevitable
rules: X, Destroy Band of the Inevitable -> Destroy each equipment with cost X or less. Use only on your turn.
flavour: Inexorable, unavoidable, inescapable…

name: Bloodwarder's Rifle
rules: Your hero has Long-Range.
flavour: The armaments of the Deathsworn will be Illidan's undoing.

name: Borak's Belt of Bravery
rules: When Borak's Belt of Bravery prevents damage, put 1 damage on your hero.
flavour: I liiike!

name: Coif of the Wicked
rules: [Hunter]: When you place a quest, ready your hero and all of your Ranged weapons.; [Shaman]: When you place a quest, ready your hero and all of your Melee weapons.

name: Doomplate Shoulderguards
rules: Each of your other equipment is Untargetable while you have five or more equipment.
flavour: Sporeggar had much to fear… until the heroes of Azeroth arrived.

name: Felsteel Whisper Knives
rules: Thrown (When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat. At the end of this turn, put this weapon into its owner's hand.)
flavour: The last voice you will ever hear.

name: Gloves of the High Magus
rules: [Exhaust], Remove the top card of your deck from the game -> If it's an ability, ally, or equipment card, you may play it this turn if able. If it's a quest card, you may place it this turn if able.

name: Greaves of Desolation
rules: When you strike with a weapon, your hero heals all damage from target ally in your party.
flavour: These greaves protect more than just the wearer.

name: Hammer of the Naaru
rules: When your hero attacks, exhaust all opposing heroes and allies.; Damage that would be dealt with Hammer of the Naaru is unpreventable.
flavour: Just be glad they aren't swinging it.

name: Hauberk of Karabor
rules: Your hero has +1 health for each ability and equipment you control.
flavour: A testament to the greatness that once was Karabor.

name: Illidari-Bane Mageblade
rules: If your hero would deal damage to a Demon, it deals double that much instead.
flavour: It is a blade with but one purpose.

name: Lightwarden's Band
rules: Aldor Reputation; Your hero has Inspire: Ability, ally, equipment, hero, or resource.
flavour: We are keepers of the Light. - Ishanah, High Priestess of the Aldor

name: Lucky Strike Axe
rules: Lucky Strike Axe enters play with three +1 ATK counters if an opponent went first this game.
flavour: Are you willing to leave it all to chance?

name: Mana-Etched Spaulders
rules: [Exhaust] -> Your hero heals 1 damage from itself for each of your armor with Mana-Etched in its name.

name: Medallion of the Lightbearer
rules: Aldor Reputation; Heroes and allies in your party with inspire are also Protectors.
flavour: The greatest strength of the Aldor is their faith in each other.

name: Naaru Belt of Precision
rules: Naaru Belt of Precision has +X DEF, where X is your hero's ATK.
flavour: The protection of the naaru is not something to be taken for granted.

name: Netherwing Protector's Shield
rules: Your hero has dual shield. (Can have a second Shield instead of a Melee weapon.)
flavour: Hey, why isn't he using a sword? - Durga Gravestone

name: Pauldrons of Desolation
rules: When you strike with a weapon, target ally in your party has Long-Range this turn.
flavour: Many a bold hero has fled when faced by a collection of this disconsolate mail.

name: Retainer's Blade
rules: Scryer Reputation; When Retainer's Blade is destroyed, you may destroy target ally.
flavour: Their weapons are as brutal as their tactics.

name: Scryer's Bloodgem
rules: Scryer Reputation; Heroes and allies in your party with sabotage also have Stealth
flavour: The greatest strength of the Scryers is their collusion with each other.

name: Seer's Signet
rules: Scryer Reputation; Your hero has Sabotage: Ability or equipment.; When your hero sabotages a card, destroy it.
flavour: We work in the shadows and lies. - Spymaster Thalodien

name: Staff of the Ashtongue Deathsworn
rules: Loyal Hero Required; Text that refers to the start of a turn refers to the end of that turn instead.
flavour: The weapon houses the strange magic of Akama himself.

name: The Hands of Fate
rules: The Hands of Fate enters play with three +1 DEF counters if an opponent went first this game.
flavour: Are you willing to gamble with your life?

name: Tirisfal Wand of Ascendancy
rules: Remove an ability card in your graveyard from the game -> You pay 1 less the next time you strike with Tirisfal Wand of Ascendancy this turn.
flavour: If you can leave Karazhan, you will leave laden with power.

name: Vindicator's Brand
rules: Aldor Reputation; When Vindicator's Brand is destroyed, you may destroy target ability or equipment.
flavour: Their weapons are as relentless as their tactics

name: Wastewalker Shoulderpads
rules: When your hero attacks, you may exhaust target hero or ally.
flavour: Only the most heroic strive to redeem the lost souls of Auchindoun.

name: Black Ice Fizzlefreeze
rules: 1, Flip Black Ice -> Black Ice deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
flavour: Hey, stick around. I've got plans for you.

name: Blaine Roberts
rules: 2, Flip Blaine -> Destroy target armor or item.
flavour: Don't start something that will end with your corpse in rags.

name: Durga Gravestone
rules: 1, Flip Durga, remove up to five Combo cards in your graveyard from the game -> Destroy target ally if its cost is less than or equal to the number of cards removed this way.
flavour: Our family has always had a disturbing penchant for irony.

name: Elumeria Wildershot
rules: 1, Flip Elumeria -> Elumeria heals all damage from all of your Pets.
flavour: Be at peace. I will not leave you.

name: Eriun Moonglow
rules: X, Flip Eriun, shuffle X Balance ability cards from your graveyard into your deck -> Eriun deals X nature damage to target ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: In the name of the storms and the stars, I shall end you!

name: Famish the Binder
rules: FRONT: 3, Destroy three Horde allies in your party -> Flip Famish face down.;;BACK: Horde allies in your party have Ferocity.
flavour: You will obey.

name: Grindel Hellbringer
rules: 3, Flip Grindel -> Grindel deals 1 fire damage to each hero and ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: Catch a glimpse of your eternity.

name: Imp Lord Pinprik
rules: Elusive;;Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests, any abilities that deal fire damage, and any [Fire] allies. You can't include cards with reputation or text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required).
flavour: No. You don't summon me.

name: Joren the Martyr
rules: 2, Flip Joren -> The next time target hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.
flavour: Judge me not by my bones. My soul has a strength you cannot fathom.

name: Kamboozle, Bringer of Doom
rules: 4, Flip Kamboozle, put 2 damage on her -> Draw two cards.
flavour: Souls are just another form of currency.

name: Koth, Caller of the Hunt
rules: 2, Flip Koth -> Allies in your party have +1 ATK while in combat with target hero or ally this turn.
flavour: Hunt him down like the dog he is!

name: Kurzon the False
rules: FRONT: 1, Put three Alliance allies from your party into their owners' hands -> Flip Kurzon face down.; BACK: Alliance allies in your party are Elusive.
flavour: Our enemies cannot stand against the might of the Leg - ah, the Alliance!

name: Marta Spires
rules: 6, Flip Marta -> Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have. Use only on your turn.
flavour: Postpone the funeral.

name: Mother Misery
rules: Sextuple Wield (Can have up to six hands of Melee weapons and strike with any number of them during the same combat.);;Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests and any Melee weapons. You can't include cards with reputation or text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required).
flavour: The Legion is aware of you. That is why I am here.

name: Obliveron
rules: You can have any number of Pets.;;Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests, any Traitor cards, and any Demon allies. You can't include cards with reputation or other text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required.)
flavour: Cower, mortals, and know the meaning of despair!

name: Phosphus the Everburning
rules: 4, Flip Phosphus -> Choose one: Phosphus deals 4 fire damage to target ally; or Phosphus deals 2 fire damage to each of two target allies.; Use only on your turn.
flavour: I like mine pink in the center…and blackened.

name: Ravenna
rules: Flip Ravenna -> Target ally in your party has Stealth this turn.
flavour: That's the thing about odds - they're always changing.

name: Ringleader Kuma
rules: 4, Flip Kuma -> Heroes and allies in your party have +2 ATK while attacking heroes this turn.
flavour: Listen to the whispers of your ancestors. They lust for blood!

name: Tahanu Brinkrunner
rules: 4, Flip Tahanu -> Put target ally card from your graveyard into hand.
flavour: Not yet… not yet…

name: Vakeron
rules: 7, Flip Vakeron -> Vakeron deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: I fight for Velen, the naaru, and the Light. What hope do you have?

name: Valterus
rules: 3, Flip Valterus -> Target friendly hero or ally is Untargetable this turn.
flavour: If I were you, I would pay attention to me.

name: Warmaster Bo'jo
rules: 2, Flip Bo'jo -> Bo'jo has +2 ATK while attacking this turn.
flavour: I don't have no schedule, mon. I just make it up as I go!

name: Xia, Queen of Suffering
rules: FRONT: Flip Xia -> Gain control of target ally.;;Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests, any [Warlock] abilities, and any allies with ally type Warlock. You can't include cards with reputation or text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required).;(received errata)
flavour: You wish to enslave me? What an ignorant darling you are!

name: Zaritha
rules: 2, Flip Zaritha -> Zaritha heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: I beseech the wind and sky - heed me now and hear my cry!

name: Against the Illidari
rules: If you control an ability, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: You're one step closer to gaining my full trust. - Altruis the Sufferer

name: Akama's Promise
rules: Loyal Hero Required; (Can't put this into your deck if your hero is a Traitor.); Pay 1 for each card in your hand to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Take this as my promise to you that when the time comes and you face Illidan, I will be on your side.

name: Bane of the Illidari
rules: If you have an equipment, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: The time has come to forge the sword. - David Wayne

name: Battle of the Crimson Watch
rules: Pay 3 or more to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each 3 paid this way.
flavour: If you choose to stay, you will have to fight! - High General Marcus Auralion

name: I Was a Lot of Things
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each opposing hero.
flavour: ...what I am now is a farmer. - Oronok Torn-heart

name: Minions of the Shadow Council
rules: When an opposing ally is destroyed, put a corpse counter on Minions of the Shadow Council.; Remove all corpse counters and pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: If you removed three or more counters this way, draw three cards.

name: Reclaiming Holy Grounds
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put target quest card from your graveyard into hand.
flavour: ...the fel orcs are on draenei holy ground, and their presence must be dealt with. - Vindicator Aluumen

name: Return to the Aldor
rules: Aldor Reputation; If you have another Aldor card in play, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: You bring this abomination of a book to this holy site? - Exarch Onaala

name: Return to the Scryers
rules: Scryer Reputation; If you have another Scryer card in play, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Many would pay a great price for the book you carry. - Larissa Sunstrike

name: Skywing
rules: During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a Bird ally token named Skywing with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health into play. At the start of your next turn, it has +3 ATK / +3 health and is an Arakkoa.

name: Tabards of the Illidari
rules: If an ally is in your party, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: These will do quite nicely. - Kor'kron Wind Rider

name: Teron Gorefiend, I Am
rules: Untargetable; Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Without your help, I would have been stuck in here for all eternity. - Teron Gorefiend

name: The Cipher of Damnation
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. If they have different card types, put both into hand. Otherwise, put both on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: You must be victorious. - Oronok Torn-heart

name: The Deathforge
rules: Remove three equipment cards in your graveyard from the game to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: ...it's time for the hammer to fall. - Blood Guard Gulmok

name: The Fel and the Furious
rules: If your hero has more damage than an opposing hero, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Whatever you do, don't forget to destroy as much as you can! - Plexi

name: The Lexicon Demonica
rules: During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Turn all quests face down.
flavour: There is enough demonic power about in the world without this text out in the open. - David Wayne

name: The Path of Conquest
rules: If no opposing allies are in play, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Indeed, these troublesome whelps are up to something insidious. - Kor'kron Wind Rider

name: The Secret Compromised
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Look at the top three cards of target opponent's deck. Put one on top of his deck and the rest on the bottom.
flavour: Akama must be warned. Our plans are in jeopardy! - Seer Olum

name: The Summoning Chamber
rules: If an ability was destroyed this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: ...they must have an area dedicated to summoning the elementals. - Scout Zagran

name: What Illidan Wants, Illidan Gets
rules: If a Demon is in your party, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: You're going to have to act your heart out. - Borok, Son of Oronok

name: Retainer Alashon
rules: Scryer Reputation; Sabotage: All keywords; When Alashon sabotages keywords, opposing cards everywhere lose and can't have keyword powers while he remains in your party.

name: Rebirth
rules: Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.
reprinted: Hunt For Illidan,Twilight of the Dragons
flavour: Birth is less painful the second time. - Eriun Moonglow

name: Lightning Arc
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.
flavour: Stand together and face me! - Zaritha

name: Holy Shock
rules: Holy Hero Required; Prevent the next 4 damage that target friendly hero or ally would be dealt this turn.; Your hero deals 4 unpreventable holy damage to target opposing hero or ally.

name: Forager Cloudbloom
rules: When Cloudbloom readies, draw a card.
flavour: The fallen grant us their wisdom from the future.

name: Finishing Shout
rules: Ongoing: Allies in your party have +1 ATK / +1 health.; Opposing allies have -1 ATK / -1 health.
flavour: The end is night!

name: Ethereal Plunderer
rules: When Ethereal Plunderer leaves play, you may gain control of target equipment.
flavour: The Consortium always collects its debts.

name: Disco Inferno!
rules: Ongoing: At the end of your turn, ready all exhausted heroes and allies in your party, then exhaust all other heroes and allies in your party.
flavour: As you as good on the battlefield as you are on the dance floor?

name: Defender Nagalaas
rules: Protector; Nagalaas has +2 ATK during each opponent's turn.
flavour: Be patient. Let the fight come to you.

name: Crusader's Sweep
rules: Your hero deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: All are equal before the searing power of the Light.

name: Curse of Exhaustion
rules: Affliction Hero Required; Target player skips his next turn.
flavour: Submit now and ease your burden. - Little Shizzle

name: Brok Bloodcaller
rules: Ferocity; At the end of your turn, destroy Brok if he's undamaged.
flavour: The time between fights is the time to find a fight.

name: Blast Wave
rules: Fire Hero Required; Your hero deals 2 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't protect this turn.
flavour: Time to turn up the heat!

name: Battlemage Vyara
rules: Scryer Reputation; You may exhaust Vyara rather than pay the cost of an ability with cost 7 or less, or a weapon's strike cost of 7 or less.
flavour: The survival of the Scryers hinges on outrecruiting Kael'thas.

name: Akama's Promise
rules: Loyal Hero Required; (Can't put this into your deck if your hero is a Traitor.); Pay 1 for each card in your hand to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Take this as my promise to you that when the time comes and you face Illidan, I will be on your side.

name: The Footsteps of Illidan
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: Attached character is also a Demon.
flavour: It is a path you can follow, but it's a dead end.

name: Vindicator's Brand
rules: Aldor Reputation; When Vindicator's Brand is destroyed, you may destroy target ability or equipment.
flavour: Their weapons are as relentless as their tactics

name: Water Elemental
rules: Frost Hero Required; [Exhaust] -> Water Elemental deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

name: Divine Spirit
rules: Discipline Hero Required; Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Draw a card, or ready up to three of your resources.
flavour: When the Light offers gifts, they are all wonderful.

name: Band of the Inevitable
rules: X, Destroy Band of the Inevitable -> Destroy each equipment with cost X or less. Use only on your turn.

name: Insect Swarm
rules: Balance Hero Required; Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 2 nature damage to it.; Ongoing: Attached character has -2 ATK.
flavour: Annoying at first, deadly at last.

name: Retainer Marcus
rules: Scryer Reputation; When Marcus enters play, look at target player's hand and name a card in it.; That player can't play cards with that name.
flavour: I'd reconsider my options if I were you.

name: The More, the Scarier
rules: Your hero deals X fire damage to each of X target allies.
flavour: One singe, two flash, three cringe, four ash. - Troll nursery rhyme
